case_title: USA, et al v. Hyravy, et al
case_info_full_case_name: USA, et al v. Hyravy, et al

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of Fourty-Eight (48) Months on each of Counts One and Two. Said sentence on each of Counts One and Two to run concurrently with each other. The Court makes the recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons. Defendant be incarcerated at Oxford, Wisconsin. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons, before 2:00 p.m. on 10/13/92. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of Three (3) Years with the special condition that defendant participate in the Drug Aftercare Program pursuant to Title 18 U.S. Code Section 3583. Statement of Reasons. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE and 18:2 (aid and abet). (2)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of Fourty-Eight (48) Months on each of Counts One and Two. Said sentence on each of Counts One and Two to run concurrently with each other. The Court makes the recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons. Defendant be incarcerated at Oxford, Wisconsin. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons, before 2:00 p.m. on 10/13/92. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of Three (3) Years with the special condition that defendant participate in the Drug Aftercare Program pursuant to Title 18 U.S. Code Section 3583. Statement of Reasons. (2)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) did knowingly possess with intent to manufacture, distribute and dispense marijuana, a controlled substance.

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for at total termm of seventy-eights (78) months on count 1. Upon release from imprisonment the defendant shall be on supervised release for a total term of five (5) years with the condition that he attend a Drug Aftercare Program and that he have a mental health evaluation at the discretion of the Probation Department. The above fine includes costs of incarceratin and/or supervision in the amount of $1500.00. Schedule of payments. Statement of reasons. (1)

The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of Eight-Seven (87) Months on Count I to be followed by Sixty (60) Months on Count Four. Upon Release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of Five Years with the special conditions that he attends a Drug Aftercare Program, pursuant to Title 18 U.S. Code Section 3583 and that he have a mental health evaluation. (See Order). The defendant shall pay a fine of $1,500.00. The fine includes any costs of incarceratio and/or supervision, in installments according to the following schedule of payments. Payments of fine to begin immediately in monthly installments of small amounts. Statement for Reasons. (4)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE and 18:2 (aid and abet). (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts Two and Three are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (2)
Counts Two and Three are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (3)
